allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Movie ratings manipulation analysis project

Add data foundation for analyzing rating inflation and manipulation across
5 candidate cutoff years \(2000, 2008, 2012, 2018, 2020\). Implements IMDb
dataset loader with chunked reading to handle 200+ MB files.

- Data loader with parquet caching \(737,654 movies, 47,765 with 1k+ votes\)
- First notebook for data acquisition and exploration
- Project structure with docs, requirements, and task tracking
- Verified IMDb datasets URL \(datasets.imdbws.com\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add historical lists parser with Wayback Machine integration

Implement parser to fetch IMDb Top 250 snapshots from different years.
Successfully extracted 25 movies from 2024 snapshot with IMDb IDs.
Wayback snapshots appear paginated \(only returned 25/250 movies\).

Next: Create analysis using master IMDb dataset to track rating trends
over time instead of relying on incomplete Wayback snapshots.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(Correction" - Ready for Medium publication with proper attribution.

All figures exported as 300 DPI PNG + PDF for publication.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
